attributes.action: introduce a national tree planting program to double the trees in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to combat CO2 emissions the Friends of the Earth and other environment charitys have advised that the number of trees in the UK needs to be doubled. Local authorities could coordinate this on their own land and encourage private landowners. This would combat co2 emissions and create employment.
